Articles.Content:
Hey guys, im kind of new here in ksp so please be patient.

I wanted to share with you guys my Space Shuttle:

I think it has enough fuel to get to Jool or Duna, but my computer is too slow so i cant even get past launch.

Download: http://www./?z7aur7tohskzqas

Please tell me what you think and, fly safe!
Wow, thats a nice design. I was aucally expecting a NASA Space Shuttle. Your's kinda reminds me of that shuttle from Armageddon.
